# RFC Text Copies

Local copies of RFC documents referenced by the SOCKS5 documentation.
Markdown versions wrap the original text in a fenced `text` block for stable rendering.

Sources:
- RFC 1928: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc1928
- RFC 1929: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc1929
- RFC 1961: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc1961
- RFC 3089: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3089
